name: Dungeon Operatives
description:
Controls:

P1 Start - solo / split
P2 Start - split v / split h

LS - move
Hold LS - sprint
RS - aim camera
LT - iron sight
LB - turn on/off laser
RT - fire
RB - over there voice command
Back - random 5 character lines
Y - tells you how much heath you have left
X - reload
A - jump
D-pad up - let's go voice command
D-pad down - wait voice command
D-pad left - all clear voice command
D-pad right - tells you how much ammo you have left

Health:
100 - 81 -> I'm good
80 - 61 ->  I'm okay
60 - 41 -> Not great
40 - 21 -> It's bad
20 - 0 -> I don't think I'm gonna make it

Character lines:

P1:
- Keep your guard up, you never know what's waiting for us!
- The main objective takes priority!
- Check the area for survivors!
- We need a plan!
- I'll Take point!

P2:
- Oh please. You thought that was difficult!
- You've got to be kidding me!
- Let's just get this over with!
- just watch my 6!
- Rot in hell!

// Future additions //

Friendly fire lines:

P1:
- Watch where you're aiming!
- Hey, knock it off!
- Are you blind?

P2:
- Shoot at me again, and the next bullet's yours!
- Am I invisible or something!
- 2 can play at that game!
